title: Squire's Shield
info: Squire's Shield is a Shield accessory dropped by the Ogre during the Old One's Army event which increases minion damage by 10% and allows the player to summon one additional sentry. It is a part of the Squire armor set. Neither of its bonuses stack with Apprentice's Scarf, Huntress's Buckler or Monk's Belt.
